summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1893, for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue and 14th Avenue Northeast, each from East 56th Street to Ravenna Boulevard, and Ravenna Boulevard from Brooklyn Avenue to 15th Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks, together with wooden cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage,, under Ordinance No. 19561 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
